subject: Football
lead_paragraph: A broken leg sustained by the Giants’ Andre Brown has given Ryan Torain, formerly of the Redskins, and Kregg Lumpkin, an ex-Seahawk, the chance to revive their careers.
snippet: A broken leg sustained by the Giants’ Andre Brown has given Ryan Torain, formerly of the Redskins, and Kregg Lumpkin, an ex-Seahawk, the chance to revive their careers.
